description_text:
Hi.

I received the wheel.  It appears to be in good order (I haven't plugged 
it in to a PC yet).

However, your packaging included 6 countersunk bolts to attach the 
steering wheel to the button box, BUT did NOT include any nuts to screw 
them into.  This means that I can't connect the wheel to the button box, 
or to my wheel base.

This makes my wheel completely unusable.  Please send the proper nuts 
for the wheel, and also please provide me with the exact technical 
details of the nuts that match the bolts you provided so I can try and 
find some as a workaround.

Thanks,

Chris

conversations.body_text: Hi Chris Ahern,  Our steering wheel comes with screws only and does not include nuts, because it is usually mounted directly onto a 70mm quick release that already has threaded holes, so nuts are not necessary.

OK, thanks for responding. Please note that to connect to a Simucube 2 quick release I absolutely had to use nuts for each of the screws. https://simucube.com/simucube-quick-release-wheel-side-kit/It would be great to include nuts as this would greatly improve customer experience - I had to travel to a hardware store and buy multiple screw and nut packages just to get 6 nuts. It would also be helpful to your customers to include this product information about mounting dimensions as well as details of the screw and threads (M5 screws, I worked out) so they can be prepared for mounting their equipment. Thanks, Chris Sent from a mobile device 
-------- Original message --------

Hi Chris Ahern,  Thank you for your feedback. For future orders, we will include 5 extra M5 nuts, as we were not previously aware of this requirement. Could you please provide photos of the front and side of the hub for our reference? Thank you!

Hi, actually it's 6 M5 nuts. See attached. Thanks, Chris Sent from a mobile device
